definition: good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
to have a taste for the exotic (idiom)

sentences.english: He is a physically active, super—curious and highly inquisitive boy.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位體力活躍，非常好奇以及很好問的男孩。

sentences.english: I asked the strange boy, raising my eyebrows in curiosity.
sentences.chinese: 我好奇地揚起眉毛問這個奇怪的年輕人。

sentences.english: They were always at the state of curiosity.
sentences.chinese: 他們一直處於好奇的狀態。

sentences.english: A couple of years ago, though, curiosity overcame caution.
sentences.chinese: 可是，數年以前，我的好奇心戰勝了謹慎。

sentences.english: Or maybe curiosity is a better word.
sentences.chinese: 或者，好奇才是更確切的詞。

sentences.english: You may wonder how many of his peers would agree with him.
sentences.chinese: 你或許會好奇他的同行中有幾個人贊同他的觀點。

sentences.english: Years ago, my curiosity asked me to invite him to my palace.
sentences.chinese: 我在好奇心的驅使下，邀請他到宮裏來。

sentences.english: Where does your nickname come from?
sentences.chinese: 您好，看到您的高評，甚爲好奇？

sentences.english: Four people enter looking around in a curios way.
sentences.chinese: 有四個人走了進來，好奇的四處張望。

sentences.english: He tilted his head to one side, and his eyes were curious.
sentences.chinese: 他把頭偏向一側，眼裏充滿了好奇。

sentences.english: just to keep you poised and on tenterhooks.
sentences.chinese: 這是爲了吊你們的好奇心。

sentences.english: Curiosity is one of the permanent and certain characteristics of a vigorous intellect.
sentences.chinese: 好奇心是構成智慧的一項恆久不變的重要特徵。

sentences.english: I had a great curiosity to see a Bengal village.
sentences.chinese: 我懷着極大的好奇心，想去看孟加拉的鄉村。

sentences.english: It's a kind of social curiosity, an intellectual voracity.
sentences.chinese: 這是一種對社會的好奇心，一種知識上的貪孌。

sentences.english: What did they tell Yang Peiyi I wonder?
sentences.chinese: 我很好奇他們對楊沛宜說了什麼？

sentences.english: Here's a video to flesh out any curiosities you may have about the blackening of the bride.
sentences.chinese: 這裏有一個視頻可以把你對把新娘弄黑的好奇具體化。

definition: to be amazed/to be surprised/to wonder
to not understand/to be puzzled by/indissoluble
to be startled/to be shocked/to be amazed
to be surprised/to be amazed/to be stunned
to become exhilarated (idiom); in high spirits/full of zest
